Time for a story clip!
Oh, hehehey! He-he-hello! Hello boys and girls.

Hi! Can you say “hello”? Yeah! Try it
louder. Ready? Hello! Hihi yeah! Great! But

hey, look everyone! I´ve made a playhouse!
Wow! Isn´t it great! It’s a house so say

with me – house, house, house, house, house,
house, house! And again. Are you ready? Say

- house, house, house, house, house, house,
house! Yeah! It´s my playhouse.

Maggie: Hello boys and girls! Hello Steve!
Steve: Hello Maggie! Great! Why don´t we

all go in to the playhouse. Yeah!
Maggie: Yeah!

Steve: Come on!
Maggie: Silly Steve! Silly Steve!

Steve: Yeah, silly me! Au! What´s missing
on my playhouse? Yeah! A door!

Maggie: A door!
Steve: Oh, let´s make a door!

Maggie: Yeah!
Steve: Come on! Here we go! Let´s go…

Steve and Maggie: up, up, up, up, across,
across and down, down, down, down, down.

Steve: Yeah! Hey, look, what is it? What is
it? Yeah!

Steve and Maggie: It´s a door!

door, door, door.

door, door, door, door!

door! So let me open the door and go inside.

Here we go.

Steve: Hello…hello!

you see me?

I am finally here, at the farm. I wonder what
animals we´ll see. Let´s find out in a story

clip, yey!
What can you see on the farm? What can you

see on the farm?
What can you see on the farm? What can you

see there?
Oh hey, hello boys and girls. I am working

on a farm. Yeah! Hey, what was that? Hey,
something is missing! What´s missing? Oh

no! My shadow is missing! Look, that tree
has got a shadow and this flower has got a

shadow… but where is my shadow? Oh, will
you help me find my shadow? Yeah? Great! Oh,

where is my shadow?
Hm, aha, there is a shadow! Is it my shadow?

Noo. Oh, what animal has a shadow like that?
Hmm, I think it´s a cow. Haha! Yeah, it must

be a cow. Hey, do you like cows? Yeah? If
you like cows say with me – I like cows.

I like cows. And again… I like cows! Yeah!
I really like cows. Let´s say hello to the

cow. Come on. Hello Mrs. Cow uuuuuhhh! Wait
a moment! That´s not a cow, is it? Noo. What

is it?
Yeah! It´s a horse. Oh dear! Hey, do you

like horses? Yeah? If so, say with me – I
like horses. I like horses. Again… I like

horses. Yeah! I like horses too. But that´s
crazy! Look, it´s a horse with a shadow of

a cow. Oh dear! And look, I still haven´t
got a shadow at all! Oh, where is my shadow!

Where is it? Where is my shadow? Oh, look,
I can see another shadow! Is it my shadow?

No. What animal has a shadow like that? Hmm
I think it´s a… sheep. Yeah, haha! So,

do you like sheep? Yeah? If you do, say with
me – I like sheep. Again… I like sheep.

One more time…I like sheep. Yeah! So, let´s

Hellooo oohh noo! Not again! Look, is that

it´s a goat. What is happening? Look, there

got a shadow at all! This is crazy! Oh, hey,

wha-what was that?

Maggie´s got my shadow! Maggie, give me my

Oh, this is boring! Come on, I want to go
and play football! Yey! Do you like football?

I do! Oh great! It´s finished. I´ll put
my clothes out to dry, then we can go and
play football! Come on!

Oh, hello! Hi! How are you? It´s a sunny

before I go to play football! Yeah! Oh, one

It´s a wet hat, but it´s a hat. So say it

It´s a hat. What is it? It´s a hat. Yeah!

Let me put that hat on the line. So, what

finished so now I can go and play football!

Come on, come with me. Yeah! Hey…hey…
over here! I like football. Do you like football?

Yeah! Oh dear, it´s getting very windy. Oh
no, my hat! Hey, my hat! Oh, my hat, come

My T-shirt…my T-shirt! Help me catch my

T-shirt. Oh no, Maggie´s dress and my sweater!

help. Maggie! Maggie!
Maggie: I´m coming! Hi Steve!

Oh great, Maggie, can you help please?

Steve: Look, look.

OK Steve, catch!

Steve: Hey… what´s that? What is it? Oh,

Hey! What´s this? What is it? What is it?

Oh, hehey, it´s a sweater. So say it with

Down here. It´s a sweater. Up here. It´s
a sweater. Down here. It´s a sweater. Well

I´ll put my washing back on the line. Oh

Maggie: Dress!

Steve: Oh, and one more thing. What is it?

What is it? What is it? Yeah! It´s a T-shirt.

Steve: So come on, say with me. It´s a T-shirt.
What is it? It´s a T-shirt. And again…

It´s a T-shirt.
Well done!

Maggie: Yeah!
